Table.Name: Account
Table.Querry: Select Id, Name, IsDeleted, MasterRecordId, CreatedDate, Type, RecordTypeId, ParentId, BillingStreet, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingPostalCode, BillingCountry, ShippingStreet, ShippingCity, ShippingState, ShippingPostalCode, ShippingCountry, Phone, Fax, Website, Industry, AnnualRevenue, NumberOfEmployees, Description, OwnerId, CreatedById, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById, SystemModstamp, LastActivityDate, simplicity__Active__c, simplicity__SLAExpirationDate__c, simplicity__SLASerialNumber__c, simplicity__SLA__c, simplicity__boolExternal__c, simplicity__boolHidden__c, simplicity__boolInternal__c, simplicity__boolManager__c, simplicity__dblCIS_Rate__c, simplicity__recCIS__c, simplicity__strCostCode__c, simplicity__strDepartmentName__c, simplicity__strFinancialPkgAccRef__c, simplicity__strFirstName__c, simplicity__strLastName__c, simplicity__strSAGE_LongName__c, simplicity__strSAGE_NominalCodeClient__c, simplicity__strSAGE_NominalCode__c, simplicity__strSAGE_TaxCode__c, simplicity__strURN__c from Account where Id ='##accountId##'

Table.Name: simplicity__Job__c
Table.Querry: Select Id, CreatedDate, simplicity__Client_Ref__c, simplicity__Tel_Mobile__c, simplicity__Tel_Work__c, simplicity__User_Chosen_Job_Reference__c, simplicity__Work_Centre__c, simplicity__Street_1__c, simplicity__Street_2__c, simplicity__Street_3__c, simplicity__Target_Days__c, simplicity__Town__c, simplicity__VO_Contact__c, simplicity__VO_Details__c, simplicity__VO_to_Surveyor__c, simplicity__Year__c, simplicity__boolChecklistRequired__c, simplicity__boolOrderHasVOs__c, simplicity__curTotalVOSchedItemRollUps__c, simplicity__curTotal__c, simplicity__strCancelledReference__c, simplicity__strEstimateDetails__c, simplicity__strJobAddressEstimating__c, simplicity__strJobAddressVO__c, simplicity__strJobManager__c, simplicity__curValueRollUp__c from simplicity__Job__c where simplicity__Client__c ='##accountId##'

Table.Name: simplicity__Job_Item__c
Table.Querry: SELECT Id, IsDeleted, Name, RecordTypeId, CreatedDate, CreatedById, LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedById, SystemModstamp, simplicity__Job__c, simplicity__Actual_Delivery__c, simplicity__Adjustment_Code__c, simplicity__Assigned_To__c, simplicity__Chargeable__c, simplicity__Custom_List_Price__c, simplicity__D_or_W__c, simplicity__Date_Raised__c, simplicity__Docs_Received__c, simplicity__Due_Date__c, simplicity__Edit_SOR_Item__c, simplicity__Estimated_Delivery__c, simplicity__Height_Feet__c, simplicity__Height_Inches__c, simplicity__Length_Feet__c, simplicity__Length_Inches__c, simplicity__Length_Text__c, simplicity__Length__c, simplicity__Omit__c, simplicity__Outside_Diameter__c, simplicity__Passed_To__c, simplicity__Plant_After_Change__c, simplicity__Start_Date__c, simplicity__Status__c, simplicity__Text__c, simplicity__VO_Status__c, simplicity__VO__c, simplicity__Weight__c, simplicity__Width_Feet__c, simplicity__curAmtTotal__c, simplicity__curPriorityCodeValueChange__c, simplicity__curQuanLabValueChange__c, simplicity__curQuanMaterialValueChange__c, simplicity__curQuanValValChange__c, simplicity__curQuantityAdjCodeValueChange__c, simplicity__curQuantityPriorityCodeValueChange__c, simplicity__curTotalScheduledItem__c, simplicity__curTotalVO__c, simplicity__curValueValueChange__c, simplicity__datVODateAuthorised__c, simplicity__datVODateCancelled__c, simplicity__datVODatePending__c, simplicity__datVODateRequested__c, simplicity__dblInvoicedQuantity__c, simplicity__dblItemQuantity__c, simplicity__dblPcentAdjustmentChange__c, simplicity__dblPcentLabourChange__c, simplicity__dblPcentMaterialChange__c, simplicity__dblPcentPlantChange__c, simplicity__objVOCancelledBy__c, simplicity__objVORequestedBy__c, simplicity__strItemCode__c, simplicity__strItemDescription__c, simplicity__strItemUnit__c, simplicity__strPriorityCode__c, simplicity__strVOAuthorisationReference__c from simplicity__Job_Item__c where simplicity__Job__c in (Select Id from simplicity__Job__c where simplicity__Client__c ='##accountId##')
